channel.title: Posts on sean's archives
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on sean's archives

item.title: Therapy
item.description:
I’m starting therapy

After a conversation with my psychiatrist, it was concluded that I needed a nAch/TAT exam to have my motivation, energy, and short-term goals and prospects analyzed in order to aid theraputic processes to help my college journey. I have to admit, it sounds like a big step, but I’m all up for it anyway. Looking back at how I “fumbled” senior high school, this was my only hope of surviving college and my future programming career.

item.title: Life Update
item.description:
Stuff can be tiring yet rewarding

Some weeks ago, kuya Jay approached me on my plans regarding college and my career. Said I wasn’t prepared yet for college so I was planning to get a job first to get decent gear. Like a lot of people that really wanted to get a job too, I’m very excited. The thought of saving up for new stuff I can use really is exciting and I want to commit to it. One thing he said to me was to value what I already have and still planning to even take further, education. “People will not respect you unless you have a diploma,” and boy did it hit me hard. I reassessed myself on what my capabilities are and how I see school, not just because of my worry to be respected, like how a human should act, but on how this will affect my future.
